title: Freelo
body:
Ahri - Domination/Sorcery or Inspiration

Ban Zed

Learn how to E + Flash

Prioritise R, Q, W, E

Busted champion, no counter play. Can win from behind.

replies.body: Then gets cc one shot and you cry on reddit.
Really hard to get CC'ed unless they get the jump on you. But I tend not to face-check or be caught off-guard because I can ward effectively, track enemies or deduce where they might be.
Then it just sounds like you're a good player!

ahri use to be really strong when her skillshot projection speeds were relatively fast compared to high latency like 200 ping servers but now its meh.. shes very easily negatable but can snowball.... doesnt clear that effectively though and works better in tandem with jungler clearing/killing mid then roaming and ganking, so not the most ideal for solo play, but decent if ur duo with a jungler and in this comm loop. otherwise ahri is shit until about challenger tier where people start getting creative... if u feed her an early ludens echo it can be really tough to come back from bled gold... pressure her about cs and have movespeed and she is very easily contained, dont bleed death gold to enemy jungler etc
